name: Pega e Larga
description:
Puzzle game developed during IADE Creative Weekend'17 Game Jam  to help promote Banco Alimentar's campaign "Papel por Alimentos".

Team:

Bruno Matos: Programming, Level Design, 3D Art
Catarina Santos: 2D Art
Pedro Almeida: Programming, Sound

You drive Banco Alimentar's truck to recover paper in the city of Lisbon. You then can trade the recovered paper for food and distribute the food for people in need. Deliver the most food and make the world a better place!
